sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Table, Modal, Form, Tab, Tabs } from "react-bootstrap" import { courseService, userService, assessmentService } from "../services/api" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" const InstructorDashboard = () => { const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]) const [stats, setStats] = useState({}) const [showCourseModal, setShowCourseModal] = useState(false) const [showAssessmentModal, setShowAssessmentModal] = useState(false) const [editingCourse, setEditingCourse] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const { user } = useAuth() const [courseForm, setCourseForm] = useState({ title: "", description: "", mediaUrl: "", }) const [assessmentForm, setAssessmentForm] = useState({ title: "", description: "", courseId: "", questions: [{ text: "", options: ["", "", "", ""], correctOption: 0 }] }) useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData() }, []) const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { const [coursesResponse, statsResponse] = await Promise.all([ courseService.getInstructorCourses(), userService.getInstructorStats(), ]) setCourses(coursesResponse.data) setStats(statsResponse.data) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching dashboard data:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleCourseSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { if (editingCourse) { await courseService.updateCourse(editingCourse.courseId, courseForm) } else { await courseService.createCourse(courseForm) } setShowCourseModal(false) setCourseForm({ title: "", description: "", mediaUrl: "" }) setEditingCourse(null) fetchDashboardData() } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving course:", error) } } const handleEditCourse = (course) => { setEditingCourse(course) setCourseForm({ title: course.title, description: course.description, mediaUrl: course.mediaUrl || "", }) setShowCourseModal(true) } const handleDeleteCourse = async (courseId) => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this course?")) { try { await courseService.deleteCourse(courseId) fetchDashboardData() } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting course:", error) } } } const handleAssessmentSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { await assessmentService.createAssessment(assessmentForm) setShowAssessmentModal(false) setAssessmentForm({ title: "", description: "", courseId: "", questions: [{ text: "", options: ["", "", "", ""], correctOption: 0 }] }) fetchDashboardData() } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving assessment:", error) } } const addQuestion = () => { setAssessmentForm({ ...assessmentForm, questions: [ ...assessmentForm.questions, { text: "", options: ["", "", "", ""], correctOption: 0 } ] }) } const removeQuestion = (index) => { const updatedQuestions = [...assessmentForm.questions] updatedQuestions.splice(index, 1) setAssessmentForm({ ...assessmentForm, questions: updatedQuestions }) } const updateQuestion = (index, field, value) => { const updatedQuestions = [...assessmentForm.questions] if (field === "option") { const [optionIndex, optionValue] = value updatedQuestions[index].options[optionIndex] = optionValue } else if (field === "correctOption") { updatedQuestions[index].correctOption = parseInt(value) } else { updatedQuestions[index][field] = value } setAssessmentForm({ ...assessmentForm, questions: updatedQuestions }) } if (loading) { return (
Loading...
) } return (

Instructor Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

{/* Stats Cards */}

{courses.length}

Total Courses

{stats.totalStudents || 0}

Total Students

{stats.totalAssessments || 0}

Assessments Created

{stats.pendingGrading || 0}

Pending Grading {/* Main Content */}
Course Management
 {courses.length === 0 ? (
No Courses Created

Create your first course to get started!

) : ( {courses.map((course) => ( ))}
Course Title Students Enrolled Assessments Created Date Actions
{course.title}
{course.description?.substring(0, 50)}...
{course.enrolledStudents || 0} {course.assessmentCount || 0} {new Date(course.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
)}
Assessment Management
Assessment Management

Create and manage assessments for your courses
Student Management
Student Overview

View and manage students enrolled in your courses

 {/* Course Modal */} setShowCourseModal(false)} size="lg"> {editingCourse ? "Edit Course" : "Create New Course"}
Course Title setCourseForm({ ...courseForm, title: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter course title" required /> Description setCourseForm({ ...courseForm, description: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter course description" required /> Course Media URL (Optional) setCourseForm({ ...courseForm, mediaUrl: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter image URL" /> Upload Course Materials

Drag and drop files here or click to browse

Supported formats: MP4, JPG, PNG, PDF
{/* Assessment Modal */} setShowAssessmentModal(false)} size="lg"> Create New Assessment
Assessment Title setAssessmentForm({ ...assessmentForm, title: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter assessment title" required /> Description setAssessmentForm({ ...assessmentForm, description: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter assessment description" required /> Select Course setAssessmentForm({ ...assessmentForm, courseId: e.target.value })} required > {courses.map((course) => ( ))}
Questions
{assessmentForm.questions.map((question, qIndex) => (
Question {qIndex + 1}
{assessmentForm.questions.length > 1 && ( )}
updateQuestion(qIndex, "text", e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter question text" required />
Options {question.options.map((option, oIndex) => (
updateQuestion(qIndex, "correctOption", oIndex)} className="me-2" /> updateQuestion(qIndex, "option", [oIndex, e.target.value])} placeholder={`Option ${oIndex + 1}`} required />
))}
))}
) } export default InstructorDashboard
